data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
Graham Scott awards the home team a throw-in.
Southampton to take a throw-in in Newcastle territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Graham Scott signals a free kick to Southampton.
Southampton have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
James Ward-Prowse (Southampton) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Southampton.
Southampton push forward at St. Mary's Stadium and Moussa Djenepo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Newcastle defence.
Southampton's Moussa Djenepo gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Newcastle defender.
Corner awarded to Southampton.
In Southampton a free kick has been awarded the away team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Southampton.
Graham Scott signals a Newcastle throw-in in Southampton's half.
Newcastle have a dangerous throw-in.
Miguel Almiron of Newcastle smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Newcastle have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
Corner awarded to Southampton.
Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Newcastle's half?
Newcastle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Southampton in their own half.
Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
Ball safe as Newcastle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
Newcastle needs to be cautious. Southampton have an attacking throw-in.
Can Southampton capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Newcastle's half?
Graham Scott signals a throw-in for Southampton, close to Newcastle's area.
Ball goes out of play for a Newcastle goal kick.
Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Newcastle.
Newcastle have a goal kick.
Throw-in Newcastle.
Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Newcastle.
Yann Valery gets his shot on target but fails to score for Southampton.
Graham Scott signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
Southampton are down to 10 men after Moussa Djenepo has been shown a red card.
Newcastle have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
Newcastle's Allan Saint-Maximin is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in high up the field for Newcastle in Southampton.
Can Newcastle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Southampton's half?
Throw-in for Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
Graham Scott awards Southampton a goal kick.
Free kick Newcastle.
Jamaal Lascelles for Newcastle is whistled offside.
Newcastle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Newcastle in the half of Southampton.
Throw-in for Newcastle close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Newcastle.
Graham Scott signals a free kick to Southampton in their own half.
Penalty! Graham Scott points to the spot, great chance for Newcastle...
Newcastle are awarded a penalty ... Matt Ritchie botches the spot kick!
Throw-in for Newcastle close to the penalty box.
Can Newcastle capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Southampton's half?
Southampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Southampton.
Free kick Southampton.
In Southampton a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Newcastle in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Southampton in Southampton.
Graham Scott blows to end the first-half.
Javi Manquillo (Newcastle) has received a yellow card from Graham Scott.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Graham Scott signals a free kick to Southampton.
Ball goes out of play for a Newcastle goal kick.
Newcastle have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
Corner awarded to Newcastle.
Southampton are coming forward and Shane Long gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Graham Scott awards Newcastle a goal kick.
Can Newcastle capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Goal kick for Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
Newcastle have a goal kick.
Newcastle have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Southampton.
Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
Matt Ritchie (Newcastle) gets a yellow card.
Southampton to take a throw-in in Newcastle territory.
Throw-in Newcastle.
Graham Scott waits before resuming play because Martin Dubravka for Newcastle is still down.
Martin Dubravka for Newcastle is back on the field again.
Throw-in for Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
Newcastle make their first substitution with Joelinton replacing Matt Ritchie.
Newcastle have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
Ball safe as Southampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Graham Scott signals a free kick to Southampton in their own half.
Goal kick for Newcastle at St. Mary's Stadium.
Graham Scott signals a Newcastle throw-in in Southampton's half.
Graham Scott awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Southampton goal kick.
Valentino Lazaro is replacing Javi Manquillo for the away team.
Southampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Newcastle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Southampton's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Southampton.
Graham Scott awards Southampton a goal kick.
Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Che Adams is on a sub for Shane Long for Southampton.
Throw-in for Southampton in their own half.
Steve Bruce (Newcastle) is making a third substitution, with Sean Longstaff replacing Isaac Hayden.
Goal! Newcastle have got their heads in front thanks to a Allan Saint-Maximin strike.
Southampton have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Southampton.
Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Newcastle.
Southampton have a goal kick.
The home team replace Sofiane Boufal with Michael Obafemi.

Southampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.

Corner awarded to Newcastle.
Newcastle's Joelinton has run offside.

Free kick for Southampton in the half of Newcastle.
At St. Mary's Stadium the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.

Graham Scott signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
Southampton to take a throw-in in Newcastle territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Newcastle goal kick.
Graham Scott blows to end the match. The final score is 0-1.
At St. Mary's Stadium, Joelinton has been yellow-carded for the away team.
